title: Response Document Field Redaction
description: Removes zero or more fields from a response document based on matching a regular expression.

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

pattern.title: Filter Pattern
pattern.description: A regular expression to test the field against.  The pattern must match the field in its entirety.

exclusive.title: Filter is Exclusive?
exclusive.description: Exclude only matching values when true, otherwise include only matching values.
